column2: A font family with a great monospaced variant for programmers.

column5:
Merge pull request #98 from doekman/installation-instructions

Added installation instructions to README
Fixed link, and added some linebreaks
Added clarification of different installation packages
Added macOS+homebrew installation instructions to README.md

Merge pull request #83 from cedmax/patch-1

Fixed link to noLoopK zip file
Fixed link to noLoopK zip file
Fix the cyrillic у as mentioned in #23

Add a variant with a larger line height

As proposed in https://github.com/belluzj/fantasque-sans/issues/23\#issuecomment-58776550
Add no-loop k also in italics
Update the build system to bake in the non-looped k
Add a link to the release with baked-in `ss01`

Fix bad generation of CSS declarations

...due to excess verbosity from FontForge.
Adjust curly quotes so that they also work well as apostrophes
Implement non-looping k in bold too
Introducing the non-looping k stylistic set
Generate WOFF2 files, fix #62, new build dep: woff2_compress

Merge pull request #61 from kartynnik/master

Update README.md with a notice on the outdated FontForge in Ubuntu
Update README.md with a notice on the outdated FontForge in Ubuntu

Revert "TO REVERT Disable checks to let master be built"

This reverts commit 8f76f89815b15399a52b525400d0d02c138876c7.
WIP Adjust accents in bold italic

TO REVERT Disable checks to let master be built

Sorry
WIP also try to fix the dash disappearing
Try to fix height of 6 and ! ≠ | on windows
Revamp quotes, fix #30, fix #42, fix #49, fix #57
Add capital P with hook, fix #52
Position accents in bold italic, lost some work bc fontforge bug
Recover lost sub/supscript numbers from last year
WIP uniformize between bold and regular
WIP bold italic: some better super/sub script numbers
WIP bold: use anchors to position all accents
WIP remane italic file (why?) and add loc. lookup

Merge pull request #41 from eksperimental/patch-1

create ~/.fonts dir
`make install` will fail if ~/.fonts does not exist
WIP cyrillic forgot some advice from @morhetz

Align top of exclamation and interrogation point, fix #37

and align the top of their reversed glyphs to the x-height.
WIP change percent and degree sign

WIP cyrillic debug

* missing tail on short i with tail
* capital ze too big

WIP straight regular cyrillic

Background shapes in the sfd file are from PT Mono, for reference.

Merge pull request #33 from rpdelaney/shebang-fix

shebang fix
added dependency check for fontforge: quit with error if it is not found on the system

Renamed validate-generate.sh to validate-generate
-- Some shells may interpret *.sh files as sh regardless of the shebang
use /usr/bin/env since that always exists. on arch (other distros?), /bin does not exist
Move all italic glyphs a bit to the left, adjust accents
Revert latest "fix line height" commit and bump version
Try to fix line height issue on mac III
Try to fix line height issue on mac II
Try to fix line height issue on mac
Generate tar archives to please GitHub
Try to fix the underscore problem
Improve kerning of the proportional version
Add block and line drawing characters
Generate better CSS (fix #26) + drop TeX fonts
Add dummy DSIG and OpenType tables
Try to have the exact same metadata for all fonts.
Align colon and semicolon, symetrize plus
Correct some glyphs (W,u,g) in bold italic
WIP bold italic and small changes

move files to match fontname + finalize italic + small changes

* straight: Q, w, y, n
* italic: adjust many accents, other finalizing changes
bump version, drop RFN (fix #19), update specimen

look better in Eclipse and Specimen.pdf

* slightly shift some letters
* make curly braces symmetrical
* detach ring from a with ring

small tweaks

* more open endings on a, e
* larger a
* shift t
* align horizontally i and l
* tweak again W
* make long s look less weird
* make 8 symmetrical
* restore g to full-height
really halt and print message on validation errors
regenerate font cache only when needed
update README and touch again W
add build instructions and dl/flattr links

Merge pull request #9 from igalic/pkg

A script to create Deb and RPM packages

A script to create Deb and RPM packages

use fpm[1] to create either rpm or deb packages, based on the platform
we're working on. This is overridable by the environment variable PKG.

This pckage contains both TTF and OTF fonts, as well as the
documentation. Currently the version needs to be bumped. It would be
better if that was read from metadata.
